Sentencas: The potential of reduction of Cr vaporization using coatings with spinel layers is the subject of the present work.

Sentencas: In this study, the influence of processing parameters for Crofer22APU coated with a spinel based on (Mn,Co,Fe)(3)O(4) on the Cr vaporization rates was studied at 800 degrees C in air using the transpiration method.
